none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 04, 2016 Description from Terminal Escape:
  I missed these fools at Aklasan Fest 3 a few months back, which bums me out every time I crank this tape. Politically fueled DBeat with shameless nods towards heavy east coast hardcore and '90s crust. Relentless vocals, persistent attack, and when they decide to break it down....? DIGMA is deadly. Nothing but this banger from 2013 to show, but I'll fukkn take it - and cheers to Aklasan Records for making sure these tracks appeared in physical form. Filipino-American hardcore is alive and thriving - keep 'em coming, punks. MMXIII
https://digma1968.bandcamp.com/

seo.title: Digma - Digma demo 2013 - Terminal Escape
